name: mcp-googlesheet
description: Access Google Sheets through MCP with service account authentication for large spreadsheet navigation
long_description: Seamless access to Google Sheets through the MCP. It allows Claude to efficiently navigate large spreadsheets by first getting summaries and then retrieving specific sheet data as needed.

tools.name: get_spreadsheet_summary
tools.description: Get a summary of a Google spreadsheet including its name, number of sheets, and the names of those sheets. Input: spreadsheet URL. Output: title, sheet count, sheet names (metadata only, no data).

tools.name: get_spreadsheet_sheet_data
tools.description: Get the actual data from a specific sheet within a Google spreadsheet. Input: spreadsheet URL and sheet name. Output: the complete sheet data including all cell values.

credentials_json_file.title: Credentials JSON File Path
credentials_json_file.description: Path to your Google Service Account JSON credentials file (e.g., /path/to/service-account-key.json). This file should contain all necessary authentication information including client_email, private_key, and project_id.
